did.unittitle: Kentucky Theatre (movie theater), 214 East Main, exterior, street scene; awning and promotional car decorated for "Fayssoux the Hypnotist"; elevated photograph: Piggly-Wiggly (210 East Main), State Theatre "colored" (African-American) balcony entrance (208 East Main), Rio Luncheonette (216 East Main), and State Theatre (220 East Main) all visible
